description:
Designed in partnership with multiple Downhill World Championship Greg Minnaar, this all-conditions tire has tall, sharp knobs to punch through dust and loam to find grip. Two 120TPI layers are reinforced with butyl, giving you the protection of a downhill tire in a lighter package. Hard-packed or muddy, dry or wet and rooty, the Assegai provides the grip and cornering support required by riders at the top of the sport.

  • 3C Maxx Grip uses 3 soft rubber compounds to boost traction
  • Dual-ply casing with butyl inserts is rock-garden ready
  • Wide trail spacing is optimized for 35mm inner width rims
  • Tubeless-ready
name: Maxxis Assegai 29in. TR 3C Maxx Grip Double Down
